name: Kirby's Halloween Adventure
summary:
An all-new romhack of Kirby's Adventure! A level modification romhack that changes all the different levels into brand spookier zones. Features plenty of brand new tilesets with new level themes (Graveyard, Wild West, Art Gallery, Circus, Temple, Volcano, Factory, etc) combined in a brand new experience!

Feature multiple reskinned enemies to match the Halloween setting, including multiple variations per enemy! (Example: Bronto Burts can be Booler ghosts, Flapper bats, be Mumbies, etc), and plenty of other surprises you shall see!
